Title: Daggers of the Great Ones
Description:
That recipe said: "rending daggers of the great ones"...

<Olon ponders this line.>

Mushan! That's it!

There's plenty of mushan roaming out there with these great, big teeth... they're as long as daggers. That's gotta be what the recipe calls for.
CompletionText:
I wonder how we'll mix those things into the brew? Can't grind them up - that'd be too gritty.

Maybe I'll just soak 'em for a while.
RewardText:
I never thought of putting mushan teeth in a brew before.

That scroll's got some wacky ideas.
